sentences.english: Seeking good fortune at the Che Kung Festival Fair.
sentences.chinese: 市民在车公诞市场选购风车祈求好运。

sentences.english: Pop big buckle, we had many wood look colorway for choice or make your own color.
sentences.chinese: 特大皮带扣，有多种木纹可供选购，亦可跟来色做货。

sentences.english: You'll be surprised at how much money you can save by shopping around!
sentences.chinese: 通过逐店选购你会惊讶于自己省下了多少钱。

sentences.english: He's bought the stocks of battered biotech and medical device makers.
sentences.chinese: 他选购的对象是遭受重创的生物技术股和医疗器械股。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought any product in Giordano?
sentences.chinese: 你曾选购过佐丹奴的产品吗？

sentences.english: We produce bicycle saddles forE- bike and supply them with good quality and competitive price.
sentences.chinese: 我司生产各种电动车鞍座，质量好价格优，欢迎选购。

sentences.english: When you're shopping for running shoes, make sure the salesperson measures your feet.
sentences.chinese: 当你在选购跑鞋时一定要让售货员测量自己的脚码。

sentences.english: A woman chooses from vegetables in a supermarket in Yichang, Hubei Province, Friday.
sentences.chinese: 图为一女士在周五湖北益阳市的一家超市选购蔬菜。

sentences.english: A clothes hook shall be furnished for each door with heavy duty hardware option.
sentences.chinese: 选购重型五金件后，要对每个门配置一个衣帽钩。

sentences.english: Finally some advices on selecting an instrument are gained according to the experiments data and discussion made from these methods.
sentences.chinese: 根据实验数据和讨论，为选购设备提供参考性建议。

sentences.english: Follow web photos come from original oil painting, all of photos could be set orders, welcome.
sentences.chinese: 所有图片均为原作拍摄，可下订单，欢迎选购。

sentences.english: Belle buy an underwear guodong suddenly appear, to her difficult unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 贝儿选购内衣时国栋忽然呈现，令她为难不已。

sentences.english: In addition, you can focus more on what you would like to buy.
sentences.chinese: 另外，你可以有的放矢的进行选购。

sentences.english: Dialogue 2. Lisa and Josh are shopping for bikes.
sentences.chinese: 莉莎和乔许正在选购脚踏车。

sentences.english: Fabulous Asia Pacific Foods are on sale in the PTU supermarkets from August 2010.
sentences.chinese: 八月份开始于本会超市有售，欢迎选购。

sentences.english: This paper discusses analytic hierarchy process for customers to select the most fittest garment sizes.
sentences.chinese: 运用层次分析法探讨顾客在网选购最合适的服装号型。

definition: to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to buy frenetically/to snap up (bargains, dwindling supplies etc)
to sell strongly/to be in great demand
the marketplace (i.e. the world of business and commerce)
glittering jewels to delight the eye (idiom)/fig. a dazzling lineup
